sentences.english: All night long, you can feel my heart palpitates.
sentences.chinese: 長夜漫漫，你能否感覺我的心跳。

sentences.english: Its a long night, no mood to sleep.
Nothing can keep us from walking off the livelong night.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼能阻攔我們走出這漫漫長夜。

sentences.english: And life's long night is ended, and he way Lies open onward to eternal day.
sentences.chinese: 生命的漫漫長夜已盡，大路開展，奔向永恆的白日。

sentences.english: Will I found you and make it through the night?
sentences.chinese: 我會找到你並且熬過漫漫長夜嗎？

sentences.english: I'll think of you every step of the way.
sentences.chinese: 詧羣我會想你，在漫漫長路的每一步。

sentences.english: The cool wind rain, long, painted Club green light a lamp.
sentences.chinese: 雨泠泠，風漫漫，畫閣青燈一盞。

sentences.english: But keep in mind this is a baby step on a long road to a truly market-determined yuan exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 但是要記住，漫漫長路我們才邁出了一小步。

sentences.english: But China is a long way from consuming too much.
sentences.chinese: 而中國要走向消費型社會也可謂是長路漫漫。

sentences.english: Through the long nights of angry weather.
sentences.chinese: 在狂風暴雨的漫漫長夜中。

sentences.english: As a dead dragon, full of injuries, covered with weeds and broken bricks…It is the Wild Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 野長城，荒草漫漫，遍佈殘磚，它是千年前死去的龍。

sentences.english: They and their teams stayed with us through the long night.
sentences.chinese: 他們和他們的團隊同我們一起熬過這漫漫長夜。

sentences.english: As palmers' chat makes short their pilgrimage.
sentences.chinese: 正如朝聖者閒談，使漫漫長途縮短。

sentences.english: Way streched endless ahead, I will from head to foot.
sentences.chinese: 路漫漫其修遠兮，我將上下而求索。

sentences.english: I’ll think of you every step of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我會想你，在漫漫長路的每一步。

sentences.english: It came as a joyous daybreak to end the long light of captivity.
sentences.chinese: 恰似結束漫漫長夜禁錮的歡暢黎明。

definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
